points.text: Inside the shell the labels tied to the specimen are visible. Important information about the skeleton is written down on these labels.
The original skeleton stands upon a platform with a framework. Both have been cut out for this 3D model, but the colour of the iron frame is still visible.
Another Arrau turtle specimen is Number 73 of the NHM Top 100. The 3D model of that specimen can be found here.
This specific skeleton is not visible in the exhibition of the museum. Nevertheless, there are many other turtle skeletons presented in a beautiful showcase in Hall 28.
